name: paralyse
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cause a person, animal, or part of the body to lose the ability to move or feel: The drug paralyses the nerves so that there is no feeling or movement in the legs.
to cause a person, group, or organization to stop working or acting normally: A sudden snowstorm paralysed the city.
